short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create custom searches with dropdown options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing PWR Search - your ultimate tool for fine-tuned Google searches directly from your browser. This powerful Chrome extension is designed to enhance your online search experience, saving you time and delivering the results you're looking for with unparalleled precision.

Why Install PWR Search?

Effortless Precision: Cut through the noise and find exactly what you're seeking, from podcast guest opportunities to specialized newsletters on platforms such as Beehiiv, Medium, & Substack.

Tailored Results: Choose between 'Close Match' or 'Exact Match' for your keyword to receive the most relevant results tailored to your needs.

Flexible Custom Searches: PWR Search provides options for custom searches, letting you decide if your keyword should appear in the URL or text of the search results.

Avoid Unwanted Content: Our advanced exclusions feature allows you to omit forums and blog pages from your search, ensuring every result counts.

PWR Search is built for those who demand efficiency and precision in every search. Elevate your online search experience and find what you need faster. 

Install PWR Search now and take control of your searches!
